long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TRACK YOUR TESTING
Headlamp records your actions as you test your web site and reveals what you've missed.

Simply follow the trail of red dots to untested areas of your web application. These markers disappear as you click links and buttons so you always know what's left to test. 

COLLABORATE
When your team uses Headlamp, it instantly reveals to everyone what nobody has tested. You can view coverage for the whole team, or just for your own testing.

DO IT AGAIN
When you're done, hit the RESET button to start a new round of test coverage analysis.

IT'S PRIVATE
Headlamp records data anonymously, using only an ID number to represent each user. It records data such as the URLs that are visited, and the positions of elements on the page.
